#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main() {
  int t;
  cin>>t;
  while(t--) {
    int n;
    scanf("%d", &n);
    int arr[n];
    int mx = INT_MIN;
    for(int i=0;i<n;i++) {
      scanf("%d", &arr[i]);
      mx = max(mx, arr[i]);
    }
    int mn = mx;
    mx = 0;
    int i = 0, j = n-1;
    sort(arr, arr+n);
    int ar[n];
    int idx = 0;
    while(i < n/2) {
      ar[idx] = arr[j];
      idx++;
      ar[idx] = arr[i];
      idx++;
      i++; j--;
    }
    if(n&1) {
      ar[idx] = arr[i];
      idx++;
    }
    //for(int i=0;i<n;i++) cout<<ar[i]<<" "; cout<<endl;
    for(int i=0;i<n;i++) {
      if(i == 0) mx += ar[i];
      else {
        mx += abs(ar[i]-ar[i-1]);
      }
    }
    printf("%d %d\n", mx, mn);
  }
  return 0;
}
